LanguageData.HerbBede.label: Herbal bed
LanguageData.HerbBede.description: Regen-boost: x2. A primitive medical bed.
LanguageData.MedBed.label: Robotic bed
LanguageData.MedBed.description: Regen-boost: x6. An advanced hospital bed. A robotic arm, controlled by a simple computer, additionally treats patient's wounds according to the instructions. This bed can be unlocked by research.
LanguageData.IIMed.label: Cybernetic bed
LanguageData.IIMed.description: Regen-boost: x9. A breakthrough in the hospital bed technology. Requires a huge amount of resources, also glitterworld medicine, an advanced components and a bionic arm.
LanguageData.AnimalMedic.label: Animal herbal bed
LanguageData.AnimalMedic.description: Regen-boost: x3. Simple medical bed for animals.The underlay is made from cloth and medicinal herbs, increasing the recovery speed.
LanguageData.AnimalMedicRobo.label: Animal Devilbed
LanguageData.AnimalMedicRobo.description: Regen-boost: x6. An advanced bed, that uses luciferium mechanites to provide better rest and healing speed for animals. Requires some luciferium and devilstrand to build.
